original_text: There are no weak places in its skin. Its skin is as hard as iron. There are no weak places in its skin. Its skin is as hard as iron. There are no weak places in its skin.
korean_text: 그것의 살껍질은 서로 밀착되어 탄탄하며 움직이지 않는구나
